nodes.title: Add support for Intent data uri assertion
Change MenuAssert failure messages to include the menu id or index.
BitMaskStringBuilder/turns flag value into strings/Jake Wharton happy.
Add matches() and doesNotMatch() for AbstractTextViewAssert.
Use OS path separator for replacements.
Add convenience methods for String-only text comparisons.
Assertions for contains, starts with, and ends with for `TextView` text.
Support using string resource ID for most text assertions.
Change custom String joiner to use framework one
Fixed error in Maven snippet in README.me
Add link to FEST home page.
Updating the support libraries to v26.0.0, compileSDK: 26, deprecated…
Updating the support libraries to v26.0.0, compileSDK: 26, deprecated…
Update Android tools & libraries, drop support for Java 7
Compare against expected value in RecyclerViewLayoutManagerAssert
Compare against expected value in ToastAssert#hasGravity(int)
Make LayoutAnimationControllerAssert final, as the documentation suggests
Compare against expected value in DisplayAssert#hasDisplayId()
Change latitude -> longitude in error message
Added assertions for preference-v7 support lib.
Assert against the real value in BluetoothGattServiceAssert#hasUuid()
Assert against the real value in BluetoothGattDescriptorAssert#hasUuid()
Assert against the real value in BluetoothGattCharacteristicAssert#hasUuid()
Assert view tag equality, not identity.
Add query parameter and authority assertions to UriAssert
Add new assertions for Lollipop's elevation/translationZ properties
Fix bluetooth characteristic intdef copy-paste typo.
Fix hasDrawable by use of Bitmap
Fix code sample for assertion extension
Google Maps asserts using wrong class in super constructor
Add assertion for Intent extra value
Add assertion for a subset of notification flags
Update minSdkVersion in v7 libs to rootProject.ext.minSdkVersion
Moved assertions from ListViewAssert to AbstractListViewAssert.
Sub projects will generate jar files on build.
Auto-deploy snapshots from Travis CI to Sonatype.
Fixed manifest package definition for recyclerview-v7
#140 - AppCompat assertions migrated to latest version
Migration to API 21,  gradle 2.1 and android gradle plugin 0.14.2
Fill out string conversions for Activity, Display, TextView and View assertions
Add assertions for Google Play Services Maps classes
Switch incorrect expected and actual values for IntentFlags assertion
Add missing @TargetApi. Add buildNamedValueString static import.
Use BluetoothGattCharacteristic write type as a value, not as a flag.
Add assertions for more util package types.
Fix POM_ARTIFACT_ID and POM_NAME for the RecyclerView module.
Update Travis config to latest needed.
Unify presentation of bit mask and named integer strings.
Specify version name for subproject properties
Upgrade to newest build tools and android plugin. Use provided scope.
Update Readme to show correct library version for Maven and add Gradle example
Add some null checks in IntentAssert
Adding not null Assertion for IntentAssert
Switch to Gradle as the main build system.
fixed missing error message varargs in "hasWidth" assertion
Positive and negative item assertion added.
Use hasTextString instead of hasText for checking TextViewAssert#isEmpty()
Add assertion for ComponentNames of intents.
fixed jar download link at the bottom of the page
fixed jar download link at the bottom of the page
